## hpr3230 :: Introduction to Layers

 Layers are the feature that does most of the heavy lifting in GIMP. In this episode we begin looking at them with an introduction, but we'll go deeper!
Links:

https://docs.gimp.org/2.8/en/
https://www.animationconnection.com/about-the-art/original-production-cels
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XCF_(file_format)
https://www.webopedia.com/TERM/A/alpha_channel.html
https://www.ahuka.com/gimp/introduction-to-layers/
